title: Urodonal 90G Granules 1x1 (P)
details:
Urodonal is a prescribed medicine. It is available in two forms as Urodonal Granules and syrup. Urodonal Granules formulation contains Zolpidem as the main ingredient. It belongs to the medicine categories that are used urological problems such a

READ MORE
precautions: While taking Urodonal Granules, the following cautions should be followed properly for effective treatment.Before taking this medicine, inform the doctor about your complete medical history.While taking Urodonal granules, regularly keep monitoring kidney, thyroid gland, and heart function working. Especially patients having a medical history of liver impairment, monitor LFTs.Maintain a normal diet while taking this medicine.Keep the medicine away from children's reach and check the expiry date before taking it.Hexamine should not be used if you have the following conditions, Hepatic insufficiency, Renal insufficiency, Severe dehydration.
effects: Urodonal granules can cause some common and serious side effects. Some of them are listed below.The Urodonal granules side effects that come in the common category are headache, drowsiness, dizziness, diarrhea, and dry mouth. Its side effects may also include chest pain and palpitations.Its side effects that come in serious side effects category are depression, hallucination, behavioral changes such as mood swings, confusion in decision making, and agitation.It can cause severe side effects that can cause further complications such as cardiac arrhythmias and sinus bradycardia.It can cause anorexia, change in ECG, weight gain, vision disturbance, and nausea.It may cause gastric upset and allergic reactions such as rashes, itching, etc.It can cause roundworm infection, vomiting, heart stimulant, fatigue, diuresis, and vasodilation.Dysuria, Rash, Nausea, Pruritis, Pyuria, Vomiting, Upset stomach may occur.

title: Cran Max Sachet 1x10 (L)
details:
Urinary tract infections and bladder infections can be quite unpleasant experiences and can render you unable to function normally. What's even worse is that these ailments do not come alone; they bring with them other unwelcomed surprises like a

READ MORE
precautions: Inform your doctor or pharmacist about any allergies that you have. Because cran max sachet can trigger allergies, hence It should be discussed prior to use.Any underlying health conditions should be taken into account. These conditions include kidney problems, liver disease, or diabetes.Inform your doctor or pharmacist about any other drugs that you might be consuming to avoid any reaction.Using cran max sachet in pregnancy is not clear. Hence do not use it during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. Consult your doctor for further confirmation.
effects: The way how medicine affects the body vary from person to person. Sometimes a certain medication can produce some adverse effects as it might not suit everyone. Cran max sachets are a safe option for the treatment of UTIs; however, mostly, some side effects might occur, especially due to overuse. Some cran max sachet side effects include;Watery stools or diarrhoea Increased bowel movementsLoose stoolsNauseous feelings/ vomitingFever Abdominal crampsBloatingSome tablets do not sit well with individuals for various reasons. Hence they might cause unease or side effects varying from person to person. These side effects may be due to some underlying health conditions, conditions under which they are taken, or reactions with other medications that one might be consuming. However, these side effects range from mild to chronic and must be taken into account to ensure the safety of health. More severe or serious symptoms include;Diarrhoea with bloodIntense abdominal or rectum painDehydrationRecurring diarrhoeaHigh fever lasting more than a dayInability to consume fluids due to nausea and vomitingMucus with stoolsUndigested food material in stools

title: Byzberi 150MG Sachet 1x10 (L)
details: These sachets contain cranberry extracts that could be helpful in treating urinary tract infections. It helps to relieve the symptoms of UTIs.
precautions: Consult a doctor if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients/components. Keep it out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature, i.e. below 30 degrees Celsius. Protect from heat, light, humidity, and direct exposure to sunlight.
effects: It rarely cause any kinds of side effects or adverse reactions. Although, you may consult your doctor, pharmacist, or physician if it causes digestive problems to you. Side effects may include gas, bloating, GERD, flatulence, vomiting, nausea, diarrhea, constipation, abdominal cramps, swelling or inflammation, skin irritations, itching, headaches, etc. Consult your doctor if you observe any of these adverse reactions.

title: Uropin 100MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details:
This medication is used to relieve problems related to urinary tract infections. It belongs to the category of medicines that provide relief from frequent urination problems. The generic name of this medication is Phenazopyridine Hcl. It is not a

READ MORE
precautions: Before taking the medication, inform the doctor about your complete medical history in detail.In case you have a history of any renal infections, then you must use this medication only on the advice of the doctor.If you notice any major change in your health after consuming the medicine, then you must stop taking medicine immediately and seek medical assistance.In case you are pregnant and experience urinary tract infections which usually happen during that period, then you must take the medication only on the advice of the doctor.In case you are a breastfeeding mother, then make sure to take the drug only on the advice of the doctor because it may harm the baby in any way.Do not use the expired product. Keep the medicine away from children's reachStore it at room temperature.Before taking phenazopyridine, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. This medication should not be used if you have certain medical conditions. Before using this medicine, consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have kidney disease, liver disease, blood disorders (e.g., G6PD deficiency, hemolytic anemia. It is not known whether this drug passes into breast milk. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding. Ask your pharmacist or healthcare provider before using any medicine.
effects: Likewise, every other medication this medication also has some side effects. Some of the side effects associated with the use of this medication are rare, while others may be temporary and go away on their own. Some people might not get affected by the medicine at all and do not feel any change in the condition after consuming the medicine. The following list contains some of the side effects associated with the use of this medication. Feeling of nausea or vomiting for some days.Headache and lethargyAgitation and fatigueBurning sensationVaginal irritationYellowing of eyesDarker colored urineKidney stones or other kidney-related issues SeizuresRapid heart rateShortness of BreathAllergic reaction from any of the substances present in the medication.Rash or itching sensationSwelling of tongue or face due to allergic reaction from any of the substances present in the medicine.Headache, dizziness, or stomach upset may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, notify your doctor or pharmacist promptly.
